entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
